name: Dashbid
overview: Based in New York City, DashBid is an early stage company started in 2011 by Don Ienner, Drew Stein and Andy Hong to take advantage of the rapidly growing development of video advertising, social networking and viral content sharing behavior, and to enable premium content Publishers and rights holders to capture more revenues around their mobile and online content. Focusing on video advertising, DashBid’s rich, data-driven platform and next generation engagement features seek to help content companies and publishers make more money on their online, social and mobile platforms by delivering better, more targeted video advertising using a Publisher’s very best internal data.

image.attribution: Tom Herman / Guias Local
